data.description:
Discover the capabilities of OMPR Quest, a versatile VR platform. Easily load images and videos from local storage, SMB, DLNA, web, and various streaming services. Enjoy diverse media layouts including mono, stereo SBS, and T/D. OMPR Quest supports a wide range of media projections like half-sphere, full-sphere, EquiAngular Cubemap, 360 panorama camera image, and Fisheye.

Experience mixed reality with Quest's passthrough, blending virtual and real worlds. Implement color keying for creative overlays and transparent effects. 

Customize your virtual environment, choose from numerous preset virtual stages, scenes, objects, and ambiances for quick customization, or add your own 3D models, images, videos, and audio for a unique touch.

The intuitive interface adjusts to your preferred viewing position, ensuring comfort whether you're sitting or lying down. With OMPR's built-in web browser, seamlessly integrate endless online content into your virtual world. Create personalized sound ambiance profiles and manage your media effortlessly via a browser-based app, requiring no installation.

Enhance your virtual environment with particle effects, weather, graphic enhancements, color LUTs, and creature features. OMPR Quest offers extensive tweaking and configuration options, letting you fine-tune quality settings for a tailored VR experience. Plus, there are many more features to explore.
